com.crawljax.core.configuration

Class ThreadConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.crawljax.core.configuration.ThreadConfiguration

  • public class ThreadConfiguration
extends Object
    This class denotes all the configuration variable that can be set with regard to the number of Threads active.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Stefan Lenselink

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThreadConfiguration

        public ThreadConfiguration(int browsers,
                   int threads,
                   boolean useBooting)
        Initialise everything directly.
        Parameters:
        browsers - the number of browsers to use
        threads - the number of threads to use
        useBooting - is the booting in use?

      • ThreadConfiguration

        public ThreadConfiguration(int browsers)
        Specify only the number of browsers. This constructor makes the number of threads equal to the number of browsers.
        Parameters:
        browsers - the number of browsers to use.
